introduction: Eure Aufgabe ist es, eine HTML-Datei namens grid.html zu erstellen mit einer 3x3 HTML Tabelle für ein TicTacToe Spiel.

specs.title: HTML Datei namens grid.html mit HTML Tabelle erstellen

tests.name: HTML file must contain a table tag
tests.feedback: Your HTML file does not have a <table> element. Please add a table tag.

tests.name: Include a table header titled 'TicTacToe'
tests.feedback: Your table should have a header (<thead> element) with a title 'TicTacToe'.
tests.javascript: (function() { var header = document.querySelector('table thead th'); return header && header.textContent.trim() === 'TicTacToe'; })()

tests.name: Create nine cells within the table
tests.feedback: Your table must contain exactly nine cells (<td> elements).

tests.name: Place a button in each cell
tests.feedback: Each cell in your table must contain a button.

specs.title: Benennen der IDs jedes Buttons von cell1 bis cell9

tests.name: Assign unique IDs to each button
tests.feedback: Each button must have a unique ID, from 'cell1' to 'cell9'.
